faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.subtitle: Answers inspired by Venngage's educational guides.

q1.question: Do I need design skills?
q1.answer: No. Our editor works with drag-and-drop. The vintage aesthetic comes pre-configured.

q2.question: Can I duplicate estimates?
q2.answer: Yes. Duplicate, adjust metrics, and send personalized versions in minutes.

q3.question: What happens if I cancel?
q3.answer: Your account downgrades to the free plan without losing projects or templates.

cta.title: Ready for estimates built with care?
cta.subtitle: Grow with a tool inspired by Venngage but made for Latin American construction teams. Setup in 2 minutes.

toolbar.useToolsPanel: Use the Tools panel to hide/show or change layout
toolbar.useToolsPanelColumns: Use the Tools panel to hide/show or change layout (1 or 2 columns)

templateTypes.classicDesc: Traditional layout with header and sections

toolbar.dragToReorder: Drag and drop to reorder sections
toolbar.canEnableDisable: You can enable or disable this section
toolbar.profitMarginDesc: Set the profit margin percentage to be applied to the subtotal. This will be shown in the estimate totals.
toolbar.taxDesc: Set the tax percentage to be applied to the estimate. Tax will be shown if enabled or if resources have tax rates.
toolbar.enableTaxDesc: Enable tax calculation in the estimate. Tax will be shown if enabled or if resources have tax rates.

header.title: Header Information

header.logoDesc: Upload your company logo. It will appear on every page of the PDF
header.estimateDetailsDesc: Number, date, and work duration help organize your estimates
header.editCompanyInfo: Edit company name, tagline, logo, and estimate details. Click fields to edit

projectInfo.title: Project Information
projectInfo.editProjectInfo: Edit project address, location, dates, and client information. Click fields to edit

itemsTable.descriptionTooltip: Enter a detailed description of the item, material, labor, or service. Be specific with brand names, specifications, or model numbers to avoid confusion
itemsTable.quantityTooltip: Enter the quantity needed for this item. Use whole numbers or decimals as needed (e.g., 2, 1.5, 0.75)
itemsTable.unitPriceTooltip: Enter the cost per unit in dollars. Use decimal format (e.g., 12.50, 45.00). The total will calculate automatically
itemsTable.editItems: Add line items with description, quantity, unit, and price. Click fields to edit

paymentMethod.paymentModePlaceholder: Bank transfer, Cash, Check, Card, Online, etc.

resources.tooltipMobile: Quick Resources - Tap items to add to estimate

templates.title: Saved Templates
templates.subtitle: Manage all saved estimate templates
templates.noTemplatesDescription: Templates saved by users will appear here

welcome.title: Welcome to the Template Editor!
welcome.content: Let's take a quick tour to learn how to create professional estimates. Click Next to continue.

toolsBar.title: Tools Bar
toolsBar.content: This is your main control panel. Here you can change themes, select templates, and manage sections. Click on any icon to open its options panel.

mobileToolsButton.title: Tools Button
mobileToolsButton.content: On mobile, the tools are hidden to save space. Click this button to open the tools panel where you can change themes, select templates, and manage sections.

themes.title: Themes & Colors
themes.content: Choose a color theme for your estimate. The theme affects the final document appearance. Black is the most formal option.

templates.title: Templates
templates.content: Select a template layout for your estimate. You can also save your current configuration as a template for future use.

sections.title: Sections Management
sections.content: Each section can be shown or hidden, and you can change its layout (1 or 2 columns). Drag sections to reorder them. Required sections cannot be hidden.

resourcesBar.title: Quick Resources
resourcesBar.content: Click on any resource to quickly add it to your estimate. Resources include common materials and items. You can also add your own custom resources.

aiChat.title: AI Assistant (Premium)
aiChat.content: Get help from our AI assistant to optimize your estimate, suggest materials, or review your work. This feature is available for Premium users.

editableFields.title: Editable Fields
editableFields.content: Click on any field to edit it. Fields marked with placeholders show you what information to enter. The more you fill, the more complete your final estimate will be.

hideShow.title: Show/Hide Sections
hideShow.content: Use the Tools panel to show or hide sections. Hidden sections won't appear in your final estimate. Only fill the sections you need!

preview.title: Preview
preview.content: In the preview step, you'll see exactly how your estimate will look. Only filled fields will appear in the final document. Make sure everything looks good before downloading!

finish.title: You're Ready!
finish.content: Start creating your estimate! Remember: the more information you fill, the more professional your estimate will be. Good luck!
